com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Class DefaultBandwidthMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.DefaultBandwidthMeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BandwidthMeter, TransferListener

    public final class DefaultBandwidthMeter
extends java.lang.Object
implements BandwidthMeter
    Counts transferred bytes while transfers are open and creates a bandwidth sample and updated bandwidth estimate each time a transfer ends.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.BandwidthMeter

        Returns:

        Parameters:
